      • anglePointPoint

        public static double anglePointPoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D start,
                                     java.awt.geom.Point2D end)
        Angle from start point to end point. This finds the angle in radians from the start point to the end point.
        Parameters:
        start - Start point to find angle from.
        end - End point to find angle from.
        Returns:
        Angle from start point to end point in radians.

      • composeColorWithAlpha

        public static java.awt.Color composeColorWithAlpha(java.awt.Color color,
                                                   int alpha)
        Compose a simple RGB color with the specified Alpha. This creates a new color with the alpha applied.
        Parameters:
        color - The color to apply the alpha to.
        alpha - The alpha to apply to the color.
        Returns:
        The color with the alpha applied.
